item.title: Mysterybox Pi
item.dc:creator: @scar3d scar3d
item.description:
@scar3d wrote:

Whenever i try to add this code

if(itemId == 6199) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(3062, 1);
int[] arrayOfItems ={1050,1048,1046,1044,1042,1040,1038};
c.getItems().addItem(arrayOfItems[Misc.random(arrayOfItems.length)], 1);
}

I get this error.
src/server/model/players/packets/ClickItem.java:120: error: cannot find symbol
c .getItems().addItem(arrayOfItems[Misc.random(arrayOfItems.length)], 1);

symbol: variable Misc
location: class ClickItem
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
